Posts.Content: Laurmarie1212 wrote: if anyone can tell me if I am overreacting bc I am so scared. 5 days ago I had this stinging sensation in one spot of my right boob. The next day I started to get itchy. The day after that, little red bumps appeared in the itchy spots on my boob and areola. But i also have a couple in between my two breasts and on my rib cage. The gyno said I think didn't raise any red flags, but to use lotion & call back if It persists. Should i be more pushy or wait and see. This breast is also slightly more lumpy than my other, but the gyno couldn't feel much of a dofference Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm afraid & I want an answer ? Is my rash IBC Laurmarie1212 Laurmarie1212
